actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend Title IV of the Higher Education Act of 1965 to prevent a decrease in the availability of student loans during periods of high interest rates.

summary.text: Emergency Student Loan Amendments of 1979 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to remove certain interest restrictions on special allowance rates paid to eligible lenders of student loans.

titles.title: A bill to amend Title IV of the Higher Education Act of 1965 to prevent a decrease in the availability of student loans during periods of high interest rates.
